page.title: 01TOTTON NORTH AND OWER
page.content: The landscape contains many features. In the S.E.it is dominated by homes and industry,in the N.the wide expanse of the M.27 ,sandwiched between these two areas are farms, woodland and a number of large private houses,one of these being occupied by a N.H.S. hospital.{The lower reaches of the {River Test can be found on the Eastern {boundary, the surrounding wetland {being used for grazing by horses and {cattle.}A large pumping station belonging to the Southern Water Authority stands on the western bank of the river.The residential area divides neatly into two,the area known as {Testwood}astride the main A.36 road to Salisbury,and the{Calmore {Estate alongside Calmore Village, {centred}on Calmore Middle and First Schools,the Community Centre,the Recreation Ground and the Saxon Pub.
